issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
Tested with Eucalyptus with Ceph Radosgw and RiakCS as objectstorage backend.

Objectstorage properties for RiakCS backed cloud:
{noformat}
objectstorage.bucket_creation_wait_interval_seconds = 60
objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions = extended
objectstorage.cleanup_task_interval_seconds = 60
objectstorage.dogetputoncopyfail = false
objectstorage.failed_put_timeout_hrs = 168
objectstorage.max_buckets_per_account = 100
objectstorage.max_total_reporting_capacity_gb = 2147483647
objectstorage.providerclient = riakcs
objectstorage.queue_size = 128
objectstorage.queue_timeout = 1
objectstorage.s3client.buffer_size = 524288
objectstorage.s3client.connection_timeout_ms = 10000
objectstorage.s3client.max_connections = 64
objectstorage.s3client.max_error_retries = 3
objectstorage.s3client.socket_read_timeout_ms = 30000
objectstorage.s3provider.s3accesskey = ********
objectstorage.s3provider.s3endpoint = 10.111.1.177
objectstorage.s3provider.s3endpointheadresponse = 405
objectstorage.s3provider.s3secretkey = ********
objectstorage.s3provider.s3usebackenddns = false
objectstorage.s3provider.s3usehttps = false
{noformat}

*Test against Eucalyptus*

Original object metadata:
{noformat}
# ./s3curl.pl --id euca --head -- $S3_URL/eucabucket/hello.txt
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:04:53 GMT
x-amz-request-id: 74ce1c33-4779-4af6-9e25-8d83674fc795
ETag: "11b7670e657c650ee36fc16992e9f4d9"
Content-Length: 11027
x-amz-meta-more: stuff
x-amz-meta-foo: bar
Last-Modified: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 22:56:24 GMT
Server: Eucalyptus/4.3.0
{noformat}

Copy object with new metadata:
{noformat}
# ./s3curl.pl --id euca --copysrc eucabucket/hello.txt -- -H 'x-amz-meta-winterfell: stark' -H 'x-amz-meta-casterly: lannister' -H 'x-amz-metadata-directive: REPLACE' -s -v $S3_URL/eucabucket/hello1.txt
* About to connect() to s3.g-12-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com port 8773 (#0)
*   Trying 10.111.5.159...
* Connected to s3.g-12-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com (10.111.5.159) port 8773 (#0)
> PUT /eucabucket/hello1.txt HTTP/1.1
> User-Agent: curl/7.29.0
> Host: s3.g-12-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773
> Accept: */*
> Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:09:14 +0000
> Authorization: AWS AKIAAOE7ESO6PNU4QWA3:/7e+SQKu1BPK33RpN9f4nWUPAsY=
> x-amz-copy-source: eucabucket/hello.txt
> x-amz-meta-winterfell: stark
> x-amz-meta-casterly: lannister
> x-amz-metadata-directive: REPLACE
>
< HTTP/1.1 200 OK
< Connection: close
< Content-Length: 222
< Content-Type: application/xml
< Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:09:15 GMT
< x-amz-request-id: b03518b6-0aae-4676-bc09-cd3b52b6e445
< Server: Eucalyptus/4.3.0
<
* Closing connection 0
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?><CopyObjectResult xmlns="http://s3.amazonaws.com/doc/2006-03-01/"><ETag>11b7670e657c650ee36fc16992e9f4d9</ETag><LastModified>2016-06-09T23:09:15.042Z</LastModified></CopyObjectResult>
{noformat}

New object still has the old metadata:
{noformat}
# ./s3curl.pl --id euca --head -- $S3_URL/eucabucket/hello1.txt
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:09:20 GMT
x-amz-request-id: 36142eb9-c1ea-449c-a3c5-76e50e0a2029
ETag: "11b7670e657c650ee36fc16992e9f4d9"
Content-Length: 11027
x-amz-meta-more: stuff
x-amz-meta-foo: bar
Last-Modified: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:09:15 GMT
Server: Eucalyptus/4.3.0
{noformat}


*Test against AWS:*

Original object metadata:
{noformat}
# ./s3curl.pl --id aws --head -- $S3_URL/eucabucket/hello.txt
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
x-amz-id-2: XJA+blahblahblah+blahblahblah+F+blahblahblah/blahblahblahblahblahblah=
x-amz-request-id: ABCDEF042AA6GHF8
Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:16:27 GMT
x-amz-meta-foo: bar
x-amz-meta-more: stuff
Last-Modified: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 21:59:34 GMT
ETag: "5ed9422475bc9a87a0b8cfc420dcb9b5"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Type: binary/octet-stream
Content-Length: 11004
Server: AmazonS3
{noformat}

*Copy object with new metadata:*
{noformat}
# ./s3curl.pl --id aws --copysrc eucabucket/hello.txt -- -H 'x-amz-meta-winterfell: stark' -H 'x-amz-meta-casterly: lannister' -H 'x-amz-metadata-directive: REPLACE' -s -v $S3_URL/eucabucket/hello1.txt
* About to connect() to s3.amazonaws.com port 80 (#0)
*   Trying 54.231.82.108...
* Connected to s3.amazonaws.com (54.231.82.108) port 80 (#0)
> PUT /eucabucket/hello1.txt HTTP/1.1
> User-Agent: curl/7.29.0
> Host: s3.amazonaws.com
> Accept: */*
> Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:16:42 +0000
> Authorization: AWS blahblahblahblahblahblahblahblahblahblahblahblah=
> x-amz-copy-source: eucabucket/hello.txt
> x-amz-meta-winterfell: stark
> x-amz-meta-casterly: lannister
> x-amz-metadata-directive: REPLACE
>
< HTTP/1.1 200 OK
< x-amz-id-2: blahblahblah/blahblahblah+blahblahblahblahblahblahblahblahblah=
< x-amz-request-id: blahblahblahblahblahblah
< Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:16:43 GMT
< Content-Type: application/xml
< Content-Length: 234
< Server: AmazonS3
<
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
* Connection #0 to host s3.amazonaws.com left intact
<CopyObjectResult xmlns="http://s3.amazonaws.com/doc/2006-03-01/"><LastModified>2016-06-09T23:16:43.000Z</LastModified><ETag>"5ed9422475bc9a87a0b8cfc420dcb9b5"</ETag></CopyObjectResult>
{noformat}


New object has updated metadata:
{noformat}
# ./s3curl.pl --id aws --head -- $S3_URL/eucabucket/hello1.txt
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
x-amz-id-2: blahblahblahblahblahblahblahblahblah/blahblahblahblahblahblah+M/jL9x+q2b50c=
x-amz-request-id: blahblahblahblahblahblah
Date: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:16:52 GMT
x-amz-meta-casterly: lannister
x-amz-meta-winterfell: stark
Last-Modified: Thu, 09 Jun 2016 23:16:43 GMT
ETag: "5ed9422475bc9a87a0b8cfc420dcb9b5"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Type: binary/octet-stream
Content-Length: 11004
Server: AmazonS3
{noformat}
fields.summary: MetadataDirective 'REPLACE' is not honored during copy object

comments.body:
Tests that fail on Ceph with this bug present:
com.eucalyptus.tests.awssdk.S3CopyObjectTests.metadataDirective
com.eucalyptus.tests.awssdk.S3CopyObjectTests.metadataDirective_SameObject

Removing them from the full regression N4j S3 CI sequence. When the issue is resolved we need to add them back to that sequence.
